Articles.Content:
I hope this topic is correctly placed on this forum. While i'm waiting for a slooooooooooooow Ion-engined burn (on KPS2) i'm watching a video about the Blackbird, and it suddenly came to me,  i love Conformal Decals from KSP1.

The vessels could be very very beautiful if we could add words and "stickers" to them. I know probably some of the incredibly loving and capable modders will eventually make the mod, maybe even the current dev for the KSP1 version, but wouldn't it be great if this came as default?

Obviously this should NOT under any circumstance be a priority... it's just an idea!

 

Cheers!

 

Edited January 27 by GabeTeuton
1. title edit
Decals. Yes. I am for it!
